_comments.buffer_frames: OpenCV buffer size (2 recommended for IP cameras, reduced from 4)
_comments.proactive_reconnect_seconds: Reconnect interval to prevent camera timeout (0=disabled, 420=recommended for Annke I81EM)
_comments.flush_buffer_count: Number of frames to flush before capture for fresh frames (10=default)
_comments.last_video_export_dir: Last directory used for video export (auto-saved by GUI)
